Gard Hvammen og Una Aurora VenÃ¥s begynte Ã¥ skrive musikk sammen i 2021, da de bodde i hver sin by - Bergen og Oslo. WIBUTEE

I 1997, i Trondheim, startet fem jazzlinjestudenter et band som tok inspirasjon fra DJ-kulturen og triphop-scenen. Wibutee etablerte seg raskt i det som senere skulle bli kalt trip jazz. Albumet â€œNewborn Thingâ€ (1999) ble spilt inn i Bugge Wesseltofts studio ved Akerselva og utgitt pÃ¥ hans nyetablerte label Jazzland Recordings, og har blitt stÃ¥ende som en klassiker. I 2026 samles den opprinnelige kvintetten igjen, for Ã¥ fremfÃ¸re musikken fra â€œNewborn Thingâ€ live. Bli med pÃ¥ gjenopplivingen av et magisk musikalsk Ã¸yeblikk der alt fÃ¸ltes nytt, grensene var Ã¥pne og impulser fra klubbmusikken smeltet sammen med norsk jazz.

entry.content:
Venue: BLÃ…
Start: 2026-03-28 22:00
Tags: KOSO, CLUB


  1. MARS | KL: 23.00-03.00 | ID:20 I CC: 150,- KOSO CLUB is your club hub for electrifying atmosphere. We bring together the best of contemporary beats, uk funk, Afrobeats, R&B, and hip-hop. Itâ€™s the perfect place to dance and be your true self. We are exited to bring out iVloud and Opal for our next club night at BlÃ¥ the 28th of March â¤

iVloud iVloud is a multidisciplinary artist and DJ who crafts sets that blends across genres with a focus on bass heavy tech, dream-like synths and soundscapes and experimental and playful percussion. She aims to reclaim the sounds of the african diaspora and invites you to enter unassuming and ready for a sonic journey beyond time and space.

Opal Opal is a Norway based producer, he plays a wide selection of music. He melds together dance songs of various genres, alot of which stems from the american diaspora. For instance dembow and dancehall. The main area of focus in the music he plays is the energy. Playful rhythms accompanied by bubbling synths and atmospheres are recurring themes in his own productions, and in his sets. When he turned 18, he set out to do his first live performances around Europe, and also spent 6 months in Berlin at the end of 2022. To this day Opal has performed at various events and club nights in Stockholm, Copenhagen, London, Bristol, Oslo and Berlin. Starting out in around 2017 he has built a discography, and made contributions to music scenes that have grown in recent years. Alot of which is in the "internet rap" landscape. Although now the focus is primarily on evolving as a artist/producer, recently having partnered with a UK-based label APLco. As time went on he has done a number of mixes released both independently, and some of which have been featured on internet radio shows such as Tukio.se and HKCR. Releases: Behind the veil [Single] 2023, Za life (ft. blastah) [Single] 2022, Adultsplay Radio ft. Opal 2021 - HKCR Vanish 2025, Seventh Heaven [EP] 2024 https://soundcloud.com/opal707 https://www.instagram.com/opal0031

PIIKSI Under the alias DJ PIIKSI, Aleksine Piiksi has over 8 years of experience behind the decks and has performed at many of Norwayâ€™s key club venues. As part of the DJ collective KOSO CLUB, she is a regular contributor to raw and high-energy club nights at BLÃ… in Oslo. DJ PIIKSI delivers high-energy club sets best described as â€œguilty pleasures in original packaging.â€ Mixing at a fast pace, she moves seamlessly between genres such as baile funk, reggaeton, UK garage, jersey club, grime, dance, and electronica, giving each set a broad, playful, and explosive energyâ€”always with the dancefloor at the center. https://soundcloud.com/djpiiksi https://www.instagram.com/piiksigram/

SOLDAL Soldal waves rhythmic, bass driven music with laser sharp synths in her own genre bending way. Throughout the past few years Soldal has made herself visible in the DJ scene playing across influential venues and festivals in her own country Norway and in Europe. She has released music through Soul Feeder, Ashida Park, Classical Trax and HTS. In 2020 / 2021 Soldal released a collaborative EP with Danish Circuit 900, followed up by a remix EP with remixes from Slick Shoota, Miss Jay, Ballo, CXLI and Miracles. https://soundcloud.com/soldal https://www.instagram.com/soldal_/

HANNEKS hanneks has managed to develop her own sound through both her recorded mixes and standing behind the decks. She likes to play a mix of melodic rhythms, hip hop references and heavier tunes crossing into the techno genre. Alongside being a part of KOSO CLUB, she is a resident DJ at Lokal Bar in Trondheim. Running her own club concept, klubbanneks, where she gathers forces from Norway`s club scene and gets the people of Trondheim dancing. https://soundcloud.com/hanneks https://www.instagram.com/hanneks/

KOSO CLUB for the love of club, art and people. Part of KOSO family. Former guests: Karen Nyame KG (UK), MikeQ (US), Juliana Huxtable (US), Zora Jones (AU), Mobilegirl (DE), Florentino (UK), Kush Jones (US), Xzavier Stone (CH), MINA (UK), Toxe (SE), Kablam (SE), La Diabla (ES), Orlando (IR), Simon Kaiser (DE), LINNEA (DE), Moesha 13 (FR), The Large (US), Miss Jay (IT), Manara (UK), mi-el (UK), Dinamarca (SE), Slick Shoota, Tia Taro, NASHA, Adipop, Ballo, Christine Dancke, Marie Komissar, Yourfr1end, Vilde Tuv, Syk Tariq, Magnus Ah OK, MERAKI, Banjee, Soju Princess & Dahir. NB! We want our events to be open to everyone and free from any form of harassment. Please contact a security guard if you experience anything uncomfortable â¤

Joe Lynn Turner har en av de mest sÃ¦regne og kraftfulle stemmene innen melodisk hardrock. Merittlisten taler for seg selv, fra Fandango, Rainbow og Yngwie J. Malmsteenâ€™s Rising Force, til Deep Purple og Sunstorm, for ikke Ã¥ nevne solokarrieren.

Han har turnert verden rundt utallige ganger, og samarbeidet med navn som Alice Cooper, Michael Schenker og Glenn Hughes â€“ for Ã¥ nevne noen.

Den levende legenden vil fremfÃ¸re sine stÃ¸rste hits fra en enestÃ¥ende karriere, og i tillegg spille sitt fÃ¸rste soloalbum Rescue You (1985) i sin helhet. Her fÃ¥r vi hÃ¸re klassikere som Â«Losing YouÂ», Â«EndlesslyÂ», Â«On The RunÂ» og Â«The Race Is OnÂ», samt Rainbow-favoritter.

Support: Chasing Embla

Chasing Embla er et band fra Ã˜stlandet, som spiller melodisk hardrock. Bandet ga ut sitt debutalbum Resurrection i 2024. Selv om bandet er nyetablert, sÃ¥ bestÃ¥r det av erfarne musikere.

De er frontet av en av Norges beste kvinnelige vokalister Tove (Tindrum, MissLead), og rundt henne finner du drevne karer som Per Nordengen (keyboard), Thomas Hauge (trommer), Freddy Aspmark (bass), Morten Roness (gitar) og OO Kure (gitar).

Arrangementer har stÃ¥plasser.

DÃ¸rene Ã¥pner kl. 19.00. Arrangementet starter ca. 1 time etter dÃ¸rene Ã¥pner. NB! Det anbefales Ã¥ komme i god tid fÃ¸r arrangementet starter da det kan bli kÃ¸.

entry.content:
Venue: Sentrum Scene
Start: 2026-08-21 14:30
Tags: comedy, standup


Fredag 21. august kommer den ikoniske polske komikerduoen PaczeÅ› & Lotek til Norge for fÃ¸rste gang, nÃ¥r de inntar Sentrum Scene!

--

Billetter: Ticketmaster.

18 Ã¥rs aldersgrense med legitimasjonsplikt. Ingen vergeordning. Gyldig legitimasjon er fysisk nasjonalt ID-kort, pass, fysisk fÃ¸rerkort eller bankkort med bilde. Digital legitimasjon (digitalt fÃ¸rerkort eller Bank-ID) eller bilde av legitimasjon er ikke gyldig legitimasjon.

Arrangementet har unummererte sitteplasser i hele lokalet tilgjengelig etter fÃ¸rst til mÃ¸lla-prinsippet.

DÃ¸rene Ã¥pner kl. 16.30. Showstart kl. 17.15.

--

POLSKI:

PaczeÅ› & Lotek po raz pierwszy w Norwegii!

JuÅ¼ 21 sierpnia 2026 roku ten kultowy duet wystÄ…pi w Norwegii po raz pierwszy w historii. ArtyÅ›ci pojawiÄ… siÄ™ na scenie Sentrum Scene, w samym sercu Oslo, w ramach trasy â€PaczeÅ› & Lotek 2â€.

Tego duetu nie trzeba nikomu przedstawiaÄ‡ â€” ich wystÄ™py od lat wyprzedajÄ… najwiÄ™ksze sale w Polsce i za granicÄ…. Bilety sÄ… juÅ¼ dostÄ™pne, a to wydarzenie to absolutnie wyjÄ…tkowa okazja, poniewaÅ¼ kolejna taka trasa moÅ¼e siÄ™ dÅ‚ugo nie powtÃ³rzyÄ‡!

Kiedy: 21 sierpnia 2026 (piÄ…tek) Gdzie: Sentrum Scene, Oslo Otwarcie bram: 16:30 Start wydarzenia: 17:15 Bilety: Ticketmaster

Regulamin: â€¢ Nagrywanie wystÄ™pu w formie audio i wideo jest zabronione. â€¢ Bilet nie uprawnia do przeszkadzania wystÄ™pujÄ…cym. â€¢ Organizator zastrzega sobie prawo do wyproszenia osoby zakÅ‚Ã³cajÄ…cej przebieg wydarzenia, bez moÅ¼liwoÅ›ci zwrotu kosztÃ³w biletu. â€¢ Zakup biletu oznacza akceptacjÄ™ powyÅ¼szych zasad.

Na terenie imprezy znajduja sie nienumerowane miejsca siedzace, dostepne wedlug kolejnosci przybycia.

Wydarzenie ma ograniczenie wiekowe 18 lat i obowiazek okazania dokumentu tozsamosci. Brak mozliwosci udzialu z opiekunem. Dokument tozsamosci jest sprawdzany u wszystkich uczestnikow, ktorzy sa uznawani za osoby ponizej 25 roku zycia. Waznym dokumentem tozsamosci jest fizyczny krajowy dowod osobisty, paszport, fizyczne prawo jazdy lub karta bankowa ze zdjeciem. Cyfrowy dokument tozsamosci ani zdjecie dokumentu nie sa uznawane za wazny dokument tozsamosci. Zdjecie na dokumencie musi umozliwiac latwa identyfikacje jego posiadacza.

ENGLISH:

PaczeÅ› & Lotek live in Norway for the first time ever!

On August 21, 2026, this iconic comedy duo will perform in Norway for the very first time. The artists will take the stage at Sentrum Scene, located in the heart of Oslo, as part of their â€œPaczeÅ› & Lotek 2â€ tour.

This duo needs no introduction â€” their shows have been selling out the biggest venues in Poland and abroad for years. Tickets are available now, and this is a truly unique opportunity, as another tour like this may not happen again for a long time!

Date: August 21, 2026 (Friday) Venue: Sentrum Scene, Oslo Doors open: 4:30 PM Show starts: 5:15 PM Tickets: Ticketmaster

Rules & Regulations: â€¢ Audio and video recording of the performance is strictly prohibited. â€¢ The ticket does not grant the right to disrupt the performers or the event. â€¢ The organizer reserves the right to remove any disruptive person without a ticket refund. â€¢ By purchasing a ticket, you agree to the rules stated above.

There are unnumbered seats available at the event venue, available on a first-come, first-served basis.

The event has an 18-year age limit with ID requirement. No guardian arrangement. Identification will be checked for all attendees assumed to be under 25. Valid identification includes a physical national ID card, passport, physical driver's license, or a photo ID bank card. Digital identification or photo of identification is not valid identification. The photo on the ID must be easily identifiable as the user's.


Tickets: www.ticketmaster.no

De britiske rockelegendene Suede kommer endelig tilbake til Oslo! NÃ¥r bandet inntar Sentrum Scene 23. august, blir det bÃ¥de med lÃ¥ter fra det hyllede nye albumet Antidepressants, og klassikerne vi alle kjenner.

Siden gjennombruddet tidlig pÃ¥ 90-tallet â€“ da det selvtitulerte debutalbumet leverte hits som Â«Animal NitrateÂ» og Â«The DrownersÂ», og Dog Man Star (1994) og Coming Up (1996) befestet posisjonen med udÃ¸delige lÃ¥ter som Â«The Wild OnesÂ», Â«TrashÂ» og Â«Beautiful OnesÂ» â€“ har Brett Anderson og bandet vÃ¦rt en sentral del av britpop-Ã¦raen. Alltid med en mÃ¸rkere nerve og en kunstnerisk brodd.

Med Antidepressants, deres tiende studioalbum, bygger Suede videre pÃ¥ energien fra Autofiction (2022) og beveger seg enda dypere inn i postpunkens mÃ¸rke landskap.

Â«If â€˜Autofictionâ€™ was our punk record, â€˜Antidepressantsâ€™ is our post-punk record. Itâ€™s about the tensions of modern life, the paranoia, the anxiety, the neurosis. We are all striving for connection in a disconnected world. This was the feel I wanted the songs to have. The album is called â€˜Antidepressantsâ€™. This is broken music for broken people.Â» â€“ Brett Anderson

entry.content:
Venue: Revolver
Start: 2026-10-24 18:00
Tags: psych, kraut, deampop


Ulrika Spacek kommer endelig til Oslo for fÃ¸rste gang lÃ¸rdag 24. oktober!

Aktuelle med sitt 4. album EXPO, er de i toppform, og klare for Ã¥ innta Revolver med sin sÃ¦regne psych/kraut rock lyd.

"If all the world is a stage, then our performance is a lonely one. Reflected not through eyes but through screens ad infinitum, our audience â€“ real or imagined â€“ is no longer a burden but a need. Attention, recognition, validation: we trade our interior worlds for the thrill of public display. In a hyper-individual world, Ulrika Spacekâ€™s fourth album EXPO offers an antidote.

Even as its five members have been pulled by tides of their own, Ulrika Spacek has always been a symbol of collective art. Despite a range of day jobs (experimental physicists, graphic designers, music producers) the collective pursuit is there in the shared dream logic of the music: the off-kilter melodies, jagged guitars and cirrus cloud atmospherics. Itâ€™s there, in all the things that are said and unsaid between them; there in the writing, producing and mixing processes they share in. And even as each of their parts moves toward a unified vision, itâ€™s never more keenly felt than in the bigger picture to which Ulrika Spacek belong."

entry.title: Ulrika Spacek (uk) (2026-10-24)
